general.name: NetLogix - Set System Time via Internet [WIN]
general.description: Attempts to set the system's time to the correct local value using an NTP server. If the device is domain-joined, attempts will first be made to set the time using the domain controller.

variable.name: usrServer
variable.description: Place an NTP server here if you have a preference. NTP.org will be used if this is left blank.
